New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Sese Bau played a fine knock of 50 runs against co-hosts West Indies
Romario Shepherd claimed the wicket of Tony Ura in the second over
Akeal Hosein dismissed Lega Siaka with a well-executed arm ball
Assad Vala offered a brief respite with a striking six over extra cover off Roston Chase
Sese Bau's 44-run partnership with Charles Amini proved crucial
